chapters.title: Chapter 18: A Chat With Siuan
chapters.info: Merana Ambrey, p. 450 (542)—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah with hazel eyes. She is now an apprentice of the Wise Ones. The events following Dumai's Wells shook her so deeply that Cadsuane thinks she will never quite recover herself. Min says that Rand should be able to trust her. She is one of those now sworn to obey him.
